alert.note: Alert for Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 2:55PM EDT until July 12 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Rutland County in southern Vermont... Central Windsor County in southern Vermont... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 255 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Middletown Springs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Rutland, Woodstock, Castleton, Killington, Rutland City, Middletown Springs, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Poultney, Plymouth, Fair Haven, Clarendon, West Rutland, Ira, Wells, Barnard, Poultney Village, Tinmouth, Shrewsbury, Proctor and Lake St. Catherine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
